title: Changes as slab is inserted with closed switch

content.question: If the switch remains closed when the slab is inserted, what changes, if any, occur?

choices.label: Potential Difference Across the Plates Charge on Positive Plate Remains the same Increases
Potential Difference Across the Plates Charge on Positive Plate Remains the same Decreases
Potential Difference Across the Plates Charge on Positive Plate Increases Remains the same
Potential Difference Across the Plates Charge on Positive Plate Decreases Increases
Potential Difference Across the Plates Charge on Positive Plate Decreases Remains the same

content.answer: Potential Difference Across the Plates Charge on Positive Plate Remains the same Increases

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
